description.full: Hole In The Wall™ is one of the trickiest, fastest and funniest video games on the planet! Now you, along with friends and family, can experience the wild game play of the global TV game show phenomenon right on the Kinect for Xbox 360! Contort your body to fit through bizarrely shaped holes in themed moving walls hurtling towards you with dizzying speed. Attempt to clear the walls in order to boost your score, or risk being swept away into a pool of water. Hole In The Wall features 20 show levels in single and multiplayer modes, plus an online Survival mode allowing 10 players to play simultaneously and achievements to add to your gamerscore.
description.short: Hole In The Wall™ is one of the trickiest and funniest video games on the planet! Experience the phenomenon on the Kinect for Xbox 360. Contort your body to fit through bizarrely shaped holes in themed moving walls to boost your score, or risk being swept into a pool of water. Features 20 show levels in single player and multiplayer modes, plus online Survival mode where up to10 players can play simultaneously.

media.title: Hole in the Wall: Deluxe Edition
